contents.title: Stacey, The Lightweight Content Management System
contents.generated_title: Stacey, The Lightweight Content Management System
contents.description_html: Stacey is a lightweight content management system. No database setup or installation files, simply drop the application on a server and it runs. Your content is managed by creating folders and editing text files. No login screens, no admin interface. How it works â†’
contents.description: Stacey is a lightweight content management system. No database setup or installation files, simply drop the application on a server and it runs. Your content is managed by creating folders and editing text files. No login screens, no admin interface. How it works â†’

contents.title: 9 Best Ruby On Rails Content Management Systems (CMS)
contents.generated_title: 9 Best Ruby On Rails Content Management Systems (CMS)
contents.description_html: Ruby on Rails content management systems provides various functionality which helps to manage the website easily & due to this reason it has been recommended by various web developers. So, Today we are going to share 9 best Ruby on Rails content management systems which will help you to increase your productivity as well as save your precious time.
contents.description: Ruby on Rails content management systems provides various functionality which helps to manage the website easily & due to this reason it has been recommended by various web developers. So, Today we are going to share 9 best Ruby on Rails content management systems which will help you to increase your productivity as well as save your precious time.

source.title: 9 Best Ruby On Rails Content Management Systems (CMS)

contents.title: LocomotiveCMS is an open source CMS for Rails
contents.generated_title: LocomotiveCMS is an open source CMS for Rails
contents.description_html: Build your website locally. Deploy it instantly. Like to keep using your favorite IDE and development tricks? With LocomotiveCMS you work locally just like any web project. You deploy your site whenever you want and can keep track of your code in your SCM.
contents.description: Build your website locally. Deploy it instantly. Like to keep using your favorite IDE and development tricks? With LocomotiveCMS you work locally just like any web project. You deploy your site whenever you want and can keep track of your code in your SCM.

source.title: LocomotiveCMS is an open source CMS for Rails

contents.title: Pico - A stupidly simple, blazing fast, flat file CMS.
contents.generated_title: Pico - A stupidly simple, blazing fast, flat file CMS.
contents.description_html: Pico is a flat file CMS, this means there is no administration backend and database to deal with. You simply create .txt files in the 'content' folder and that becomes a page.
contents.description: Pico is a flat file CMS, this means there is no administration backend and database to deal with. You simply create .txt files in the 'content' folder and that becomes a page.

contents.description: Small Victories is a simple way to make a website out of the contents of a Dropbox folder.

contents.title: Ghost - Just a blogging platform
contents.description_html:
Ghost is an open source publishing platform which is beautifully designed, easy to use, and free for everyone. Start a blog with Ghost today and learn to blog!

Self-hosting free: <a href="https://ghost.org/pricing/">Pricing</a>
Open-source: <a href="https://github.com/TryGhost/Ghost">Github</a>
contents.description: Ghost is an open source publishing platform which is beautifully designed, easy to use, and free for everyone. Start a blog with Ghost today and learn to blog! Self-hosting free: Pricing Open-source: Github

contents.title: Perch, the really little content management system
contents.generated_title: Perch, the really little content management system
contents.description_html: You care about good design, and providing fast, easy-to-edit sites to your clients. Meet Perch - a content management system built for designers like you.

contents.title: Siteleaf
contents.description_html: Pages are the main building blocks in Siteleaf. The most basic page has a title and a body, but they can also have unlimited subpages, posts, assets and metadata. Arranging your pages is easy, just drag and drop. Posts belong to a page.
contents.description: Pages are the main building blocks in Siteleaf. The most basic page has a title and a body, but they can also have unlimited subpages, posts, assets and metadata. Arranging your pages is easy, just drag and drop. Posts belong to a page.

contents.generated_title: Use Google Spreadsheets as your CMS | Gridspree
